definition[0]: used to show that the woman or girl who does something is affected by her own action
example[0]: She cut herself on some broken glass.
example[1]: She made herself a cup of coffee.
definition[1]: used to emphasize that you are talking about one particular woman or girl
example[2]: It must be true that she’s leaving because she told me so herself.
example[3]: The ornate Town Hall was opened by Queen Victoria herself.
example[4]: She met other mothers in the same situation as herself.
